text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Gahhh! This sucks! I thought I had it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But what a great race! Beating me is a<n>pretty big
deal!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It feels great to run against such<n>formidable
opponents! My tail is still<n>quiverin' with
adrenaline!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I was clearly out of my depth, which<n>sucks, but it
was a battle to remember.
choice_data_list: You've got the next one for sure!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I thought I had it in me to pull through,<n>but that
was just naive thinking. Now<n>that it's come to this,
there's only one<n>thing I can do...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And that's to move my body like there's<n>no
tomorrow! Time to do some running<n>to clear my
mind!
choice_data_list: But you just finished a race!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, so now I gotta do a post-race run!<n>Time to
book it all the way home!<n>Raaaah!

I hurry after her, but I can't keep up with<n>Hishi
Amazon sprinting at full speed.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It goes without sayin' that I'll never give<n>up, no
matter how good my opponents<n>are!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Every second I'm not eating or sleeping,<n>I'm
gonna be training! Or y'know what?<n>Forget
sleeping too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, whatever! I'm just saying that's<n>how far I'm
willin' to go! I gotta keep<n>training to secure that
next win!
